ratings.comment: Amy is an amazing professor and a really sweet person. She works with you through any problem you might be dealing with and in general, is such an understanding person. You can tell she is passionate about her profession and it's a great opportunity to learn about how children develop skills through play. Attendance is required and there is a book!

Professor Wagner is a fantastic professor! I have had her before and I keep taking more classes with her. She is very funny and also very compassionate about the material. She wants students to succeed and is always ready to help when you need it. I highly recommend taking a class with her.
Not willing to help out after class at all.

Amy Wagner is my favorite professor at UW Madison. She is so responsive to what the class needs. She's always checking in with the class to see if the plan for that day is working for them. She's super knowledgeable and clearly cares about what she's teaching. Her lectures make me genuinely excited to come to class.

Professor Amy is incredible. She is very connected with all of her students and very passionate about the class material. She really changed my perspective on many topics and I learned so much about development on such a fascinating way. Would highly recommend to anyone, especially those going into educational or therapeutic fields.
She was hilarious and always found great ways to connect our lessons to real life. Lots of studying necessary but an amazing teacher that I would absolutely take again.
I have so much respect for Dr. Wagner. She is such an amazing professor and definitely cares a lot about her students. This class was also so fun! Will definitely be taking more classes with her!

Dr. Wagner is very kind and wants to see her students succeed. The class was pretty straightforward, but she posted her lectures pretty late throughout the semester. The TA would always dock points for minor things. I wouldn't bother reading the textbook, just watch the lecture videos and you'll have enough to easily do the quizzes.

Professor Wagner is super nice but a little scatter brained. Lectures were consistently posted late which made it hard to stay organized with the class. Weekly quizzes and two papers that were graded very fairly. Take solid notes in lecture and you will be fine. Don't bother doing the readings
Amy is amazing!! I recommend this class to all my friends. More people need to take this class. You're missing out if you don't.
